title: Org AST node
description: An element or object in an org document's Abstract Syntax Tree.

org_node_type.description: The node's type, as obtained by (org-element-type).

properties.description: Mapping of property names (with initial colon removed) to values.

keywords.description: Any nodes of type "keyword" are omitted from "contents" and instead included here as key-value pairs.

contents.description: Contents of node as obtained by (org-element-contents). Either nested org nodes or strings.
